class.name: SGPhysics2DServer
class.brief_description: Server to access low-level objects from SG Physics 2D.
class.description: SGPhysics2DServer can be used to create and manipulate low-level objects from SG Physics 2D without having to use nodes.

method.name: area_get_overlapping_area_collisions
method.description: Returns a list of [SGAreaCollision2D]s for the overlapping areas.

method.name: area_get_overlapping_area_count
method.description: Returns the number of overlapping areas. If you only need the count, this method is somewhat faster than counting the elements in the array returned by [method area_get_overlapping_areas].

method.name: area_get_overlapping_areas
method.description: Returns a list of overlapping [SGArea2D]s or [RID]s.

method.name: area_get_overlapping_bodies
method.description: Returns a list of overlapping [SGStaticBody2D]s, [SGCharacterBody2D]s or [RID]s.

method.name: area_get_overlapping_body_collisions
method.description: Returns a list of [SGAreaCollision2D]s for the overlapping bodies.

method.name: area_get_overlapping_body_count
method.description: Returns the number of overlapping bodies. If you only need the count, this method is somewhat faster than counting the elements in the array returned by [method area_get_overlapping_bodies].

method.name: body_get_safe_margin
method.description: Returns the extra margin used for separating the body before [method body_move_and_collide] or [method body_unstuck].

method.name: body_get_type
method.description: Returns the type of the collision body.

method.name: body_move_and_collide
method.description: Moves the body, stopping on any collision.

method.name: body_set_safe_margin
method.description: Sets the extra margin used for separating the body before [method body_move_and_collide] or [method body_unstuck].

method.name: body_unstuck
method.description: Attempts to get the body unstuck if it's currently overlapping another body.

method.name: circle_get_radius
method.description: Returns the radius of the circle shape.

method.name: circle_set_radius
method.description: Sets the radius of the circle shape.

method.name: collision_object_add_shape
method.description: Adds a shape to the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_create
method.description: Creates a collision object.

method.name: collision_object_get_collision_layer
method.description: Returns the collision layer of the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_get_collision_mask
method.description: Sets the collision mask of the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_get_data
method.description: Returns internal data used by the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_get_monitorable
method.description: Returns true if the collision object is monitorable; otherwise false.

method.name: collision_object_get_transform
method.description: Returns the transform of the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_get_type
method.description: Returns the type of the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_remove_shape
method.description: Removes a shape from the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_set_collision_layer
method.description: Sets the collision layer of the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_set_collision_mask
method.description: Sets the collision mask of the collision object.

method.name: collision_object_set_data
method.description: Sets internal data used by the collision object. This can be either a node or a string. The data is to sort the object to ensure deterministic results.

method.name: collision_object_set_monitorable
method.description: Sets the collision object as monitorable or not.

method.name: collision_object_set_transform
method.description: Returns the transform of the collision object.

method.name: free_rid
method.description: Destroys any of the objects created by the physics server.

method.name: get_default_world
method.description: Returns the RID of the default world.

method.name: polygon_get_points
method.description: Returns the points from the polygon shape.

method.name: polygon_set_points
method.description: Sets the points of the polygon shape.

method.name: rectangle_get_extents
method.description: Returns the extents of the rectangle shape.

method.name: rectangle_set_extents
method.description: Sets the extents of the rectangle shape.

method.name: shape_create
method.description: Creates a shape.

method.name: shape_get_data
method.description: Returns the internal data used by the shape.

method.name: shape_get_transform
method.description: Returns the shape's transform.

method.name: shape_get_type
method.description: Returns the type of the shape.

method.name: shape_set_data
method.description: Sets the internal data used by the shape.

method.name: shape_set_transform
method.description: Sets the shape's transform.

method.name: world_add_collision_object
method.description: Adds a collision object to the world.

method.name: world_create
method.description: Creates a world.

method.name: world_remove_collision_object
method.description: Removes a collision object from the world.
